summary: A down-on-his-luck California apartment house manager hatches a plan to rob a Catalina Island bank--and escape with his accomplices using scuba gear.
cast: Ken Scott|Merry Anders|Russ Bender|Booth Colman|Garth Benton|Bruce Anson|Walter Maslow|Stacey Winters|Ray Dannis|Larry Barton|Roger Creed
title: Raiders from Beneath the Sea
